title: VPN not working from home
desc: I am trying to connect to the corporate VPN from home, but the connection always fails.

title: Outlook email opens very slowly
desc: My Outlook takes several minutes to open emails and sometimes freezes.

title: Network printer not printing
desc: I sent documents to the printer, but they are stuck in the print queue.

title: SAP freezes during report generation
desc: When I try to generate a report in SAP, the application freezes or crashes.

title: No access to shared folder
desc: I cannot open a shared network folder, I get an access denied message.

title: Computer does not power on
desc: My computer does not start when I press the power button.

title: Camera not working in Microsoft Teams
desc: Teams cannot detect my webcam during meetings.

title: Cannot log in to domain account
desc: I am entering correct credentials, but Windows does not let me log in.

title: Windows blue screen error
desc: My computer suddenly shows a blue screen and restarts.

title: Internet is very slow in the office
desc: Websites and internal systems load extremely slowly today.

title: Windows updates not installing
desc: Updates are stuck at 0% and never complete.

title: Wi-Fi not working on laptop
desc: I cannot see any Wi-Fi networks on my laptop.

title: SAP license error
desc: SAP shows a license error and does not allow me to log in.

title: Outlook not sending emails
desc: My emails stay in the Outbox and are not being sent.

title: Microphone not working
desc: People cannot hear me during calls, even though my mic is connected.

title: Drive C is full
desc: I am getting warnings that my system drive has no free space left.

title: Corporate portal not opening
desc: I cannot access the internal corporate portal from my workstation.

title: OneDrive not syncing files
desc: My files are not syncing to OneDrive anymore.

title: Printer prints blank pages
desc: The printer prints empty pages even though the document has text.

title: Keyboard not responding
desc: Some keys on my keyboard stopped working.

title: Google Chrome keeps freezing
desc: Chrome becomes unresponsive after a few minutes of use.

title: Skype does not start
desc: Skype closes immediately after I launch it.

title: RDP connection error
desc: I cannot connect to a remote desktop server via RDP.

title: Scanner not detected
desc: My scanner is connected, but Windows does not see it.

title: No sound on my computer
desc: I see volume indicators, but there is no sound at all.

title: Oracle system is very slow
desc: Oracle applications respond very slowly when I try to work.

title: Cannot open email attachments
desc: I receive an error when trying to open email attachments.

title: Password has expired
desc: My password expired and I cannot log in to my account.

title: USB device not recognized
desc: When I plug in a USB device, nothing happens.

title: Application crashes after update
desc: After the last update, the application crashes immediately on startup.
